 2007-19182007-12-13,  TC,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, III AND VIII) so that holders of an airport certificate, a manufacturer certificate or an ATS operations certificate will be required to appoint an accountable executive, and holders of an airport certificate or ATS operations certificate will be required to institute a safety management system.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0290 Publication Date: 2007-12-26
